titleStmt.title: To the Maiestie of King Iames A gratulatorie poem by Michaell Drayton.
titleStmt.author: Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iames Roberts, for T. M[an] and H. L[ownes],

notesStmt.note: In this first state "To the reader" on B3r begins "For the truth .."; the first roundel of the genealogical table has "Soueraygne".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
